2064.subject: HPWE
2064.descrlong: Enables graduate students to enrich Human Performance and Wellness 300 or 400 level courses to satisfy graduate level requirements.  Prior to enrolling in the course, students must seek instructor permission, provide a description of the course content, and submit a proposal to explain how additional and enriched graduate level assignments will be implemented.  Needs to be approved by the faculty advisor, course instructor, dean, and program director.  (Offered only as interest warrants.)
